website_summaries.verdict: Complete kit that comes with waxing supplies and a well-made warmer, plus a satisfaction guarantee.
pros: A comprehensive wax kit that comes with a warmer, applicators, and lavender- scented wax beads
Heating unit earns praise for having a sturdy feel and being easy to use and clean
cons: Some reports of faulty warmers, and of the wax not fully removing fine hairs

customer_reviews.title: Works great, Unclear instructions
customer_reviews.text: This product came very quickly. I purchased this on an impulse and immediately used my husband as a guinea pig. The instructions were unclear for set up and there were zero instructions for the application, but it's pretty common sense. Takes a little practice getting the temperature right and figuring how thick/thin to apply the wax. You can't really apply in large swatches as some demo videos have shown, but it works. I've only tried the black wax - can't wait to try the others! It does smell a little, but not bad enough you can't overlook it. Overall, was happy with how well it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Wax Warmer
customer_reviews.text: Order this wax warmer recently and it was delivered fast. Recently opened it up and it came with a lot of wax beads. The use of this wax warmer is very straight forward. Just melt the wax an apply it to the area you need waxing. So far, we have used this to wax eyebrows. We used the highest temperature to melt the wax and it was hot when applied to the skin but did not burn the skin at all. This wax ripped out all the hair as promised and we are very happy with this wax warmer.
customer_reviews.author: C. Palumbo

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely did not work as I expected. I did get hot and melted the wax but as soon as you lower the heat it gets cold right away and stiff. You can't keep it warm long enough to put it on, so basically you have to have it on hight heat the whole time. I tried to put it on before it got stiff but it hurt because it was really hot. Once I managed to get it on my arm hair and it was time to pull it off, it did not take off any hair at all. Do not waste your time or money..
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Set!
customer_reviews.text: My sister in law loved how easy it was to use my wax warmer and beads so I bought this set as a gift for her birthday. I love that it came with 4 bags of beads and a pack of sticks to get her started. Plucking hurts and take times and we know she does not have time to deal with all that so she is super happy to have her own wax kit at home. Wax beads melt fast and hair removal is quick and nowhere as painful as using wax with strips.
customer_reviews.author: Belle's Book Labyrinth

customer_reviews.title: Temperature control
customer_reviews.text: I like how you can take out the container once the wax is ready to use
customer_reviews.author: Lis

customer_reviews.title: Defective dial - but resolved quickly!
customer_reviews.text: My original Warner had a defective dial, but the company was quick on responding to my grievance. They sent me a new one free of charge. I am impressed with their quick service. I haven’t been able to use the new one yet, but I am sure it works well. I loved the original one, so I’m positive with the issue being resolved the new one will be amazing! Can’t wait to use it. Love the customer service. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rima Patel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on this!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. The warmer works fine but it looked like it has been used before. The packaging says so too. The wax is either so old or is literally plastic. It snaps doesn’t pull any hair out and gave me an awful rash. Literally smells like plastic burning when it’s being warmed and there is no actual scent to any of the 4 waxes I’ve received. Would not waste my money on this! I tried to make it work but I ended up throwing the whole thing away.
customer_reviews.author: Jujubeez11

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but leave some areas to the pros!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very great product. I will say...ripping the wax off yourself probably isn’t the smartest thing to do, unless you can tolerate it. Me personally, I can’t in some areas of my body. I waxed my arm pits-no problem! So I said, let me wax my legs-Perfect! I was feeling myself and decided to do a wax down under-big mistake!!! Leave that portion to the pros (or a friend or a hubby). That way they can snatch off the wax for you. The amount of pain that comes with it, I’m pretty sure you won’t snatch another piece off your vajayjay. Just...trust me. I have pics, but yea...just trust me lol
customer_reviews.author: HeyRell

customer_reviews.title: Great wax heater and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product after looking for the right wax warmer. I could not pass up the price and the 4 bags of hard wax beads it came with. It didn’t take long for the wax to melt and it was the perfect temperature. When I used the wax it went on easily and it didn’t hurt taking it off and it got all the hairs! I am so happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ILP

customer_reviews.title: quick and easy warming
customer_reviews.text: the wax warmer warms up the beans nice and quick. the beans are also kind a small so i guess that also speeds up the process. it was able to keep the melted wax at the same temperature. a tip for beginners please watch lots of youtube videos on hw to use the hard beans wax properly. if its left on for too long it will turn hard and break. you have to pull it off while its still; stretchy. it worked great for me and for its price its the best deal.
customer_reviews.author: ADDISON

customer_reviews.title: Came off with my skin.. IT HURTS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try this out. I have always just shaved using a razor since I'm a guy. I was like let's try waxing again. I have done it before and it was time consuming so I left. But I came back to it after I bought this. Got it in mail next day delivery. Opened it and warmed a whole packet. Ready to wax. First one I put on my chest. Ripped it out and it came out along with my skin. It hurt so bad. I was so disappointed in this. I left it and turned it all off and put it away. Today, next day see in pictures what happened to my skin...
customer_reviews.author: HIREN PATEL

customer_reviews.title: Either hair break or stay there.. don't get clean skin after waxing like after others
customer_reviews.text: I got mine today only. Was so excited about it. But very disappointed with results. I have been waxing myself since last 10 years. I found this one is the worst of my life. Temperature is very inconsistent of the warmer. If it's on the medium, then it is starts getting thicker. And if it's on high, then you get burn..nothing works in between. Or wax quality is cheaper , that makes waxing difficult. It doesn't pull all hair in once.. for many times have to go through on same spot. Either hair breaks or doesn't pulled out.. Going to return it..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very satisfying and soothing
customer_reviews.text: i really love this product. i wouldnt regret using it because it really does work for me. i use it to wax my eyebrows and it worked out perfect. it doesn’t hurt at all and it’s very satisfying ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: To begin with, the instructions are obviously poorly translated and so are confusing. They also have no instructions on how to actually wax, which is fine if you've done it before or had it done before. The only reason I knew which direction to pull the wax was from another kit I'd looked at. I still must not have gotten it right because it only got maybe half the hair. They also don't tell you that once it reaches a certain temperature it automatically shuts off then turns back on later to keep it hot. Not a bad feature but would be good to know ahead of time. All in all, not for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to use
customer_reviews.text: I have watched numerous videos on how to apply and my sister even tried and we totally failed. The needs melt fairly quickly and we didn't burn ourselves because of the handle it comes with but getting the product out and on to your body is difficult. When we pick the popsicle stick out with the was it just keeps dripping the product. We could never get a good amount to put on our arm or leg without it spilling off the side or on the floor. Just shave or go pay because you're going to have to keep buying beads anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Torres

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Warmer!
customer_reviews.text: The wax warmer doesn't take much time to melt. However, I have not found the perfect temperature to keep the wax warm, but not to cold. The medium setting is a bit too hot, but anything below this setting makes it too cold. I hope I can find the right temperature soon, since I have only recently started using it. The quality is good considering the price of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Save your time and money.
customer_reviews.text: The beads smell like burning toxic plastic - not pleasant scents like advertising. Very chemical heavy smell. This thing was a beast to clean. Ended up buying expensive wax cleaner that was almost as much as the kit. Used once. Would like to return for a refund. Save your time and money. I will go back to paying a professional with professional products to get the job done right.
customer_reviews.author: A Frazier/Green Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Wax is stringy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit. The only thing I don't love is that the wax is not the highest quality, however, it gets the job done. I waxed my underarms and noticed that when applying the wax it was very stringy. Which caused a bit of a mess. Other than that the unit warms up quickly, and be careful because it gets hot!! Once I run out the wax pellets this comes with I will most certainly buy a better quality of wax. Good purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Great waxer
customer_reviews.text: This waxer works great. I love that I dont have to use strips anymore. Just lay down the wax and yank off. I like to put the temp to the highest level to melt the wax beads. Once everything is melted I turn. The temp down slightly above medium and let it cool down to that temp a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Jazminv

customer_reviews.title: Not wax!!!
customer_reviews.text: The wax melter itself seems to work fine. It’s lightweight and melts quickly. However the product that comes with is definitely not wax. It smells and feels just like hot glue. It’s extremely stringy (as you can see in the pictures). It’s also VERY VERY painful to remove. Had to give up partway through using it due to the pain. Definitely not as advertised. Would HIGHLY recommend buying real wax from a legitimate source.
customer_reviews.author: Aires Rafael Gonguela

customer_reviews.title: It did not work, don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not write reviews, but this product needed an honest one. It is very easy to use, although it does not get the job done. I tried this on my arms, legs, and eyebrows and I am very disappointed in this product. First off, the machine kept turning on and off as it was plugged in. Then, the wax would dry before I could even put it on my skin. I could tell this was not a good brand of wax to use. It removed maybe 3 single hairs each time I used it, but that was it. I am very disappointed and would not recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great for a girls night!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It’s just getting down how hot it should be, when to pull it off, and figuring out the right technique. Since I didn’t fully know how to do it I used quite a few beads and it was a bit of a mess but as the process went on everything started getting better and easier. I had a blast doing this with my friend!
customer_reviews.author: Christy A.

customer_reviews.title: Do not use the beans that they provide
customer_reviews.text: The machine itself is just fine and does what it is advertised for but the beans that come with are horrible. They are very low quality and plastic-like. EDIT: Returning the machine, it doesn’t maintain heat and melts unevenly. I tried to melt it for a long time but it did not melt. I do not know if the beads are low quality or what. Maybe my piece is faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Vrushank

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Used 2times. Wax is like a plastic, can't be used properly. Waxheater on the other hand melts the wax but the temperature seems toooooo hot, if I get it on lower wax becomes hard.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: The product came sooner than expected. The quality of the wax is good - the beads melt easily and once the consistency of the melted wax is like honey it is ready to use. The temperature control dial is self explanatory and wax/sticks are provided. The amount of wax (4 bags) provided could wax your eyebrows for at least a year. Although the melting pot doesn’t feel sturdy it dropped two or three times and nothing on the pot broke or cracked. For the amount spent I received more than expected. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kera

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: This wax is pretty awesome. I received it within 2 days. I used it the other night and it’s super easy to use . The only thing is, I wish it came with a repair oil or something because I had some bumps and burning feeling afterwards. I applied a cold pack to the areas I waxed for about 20 minutes and I put aloe Vera on it as well. The next day it’s so smooth and no hair! Def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waist your money
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use it and the temperature can’t be control even if you keep it on warm and the wax itself so disappointing it dosent take out any hair I tried to do the same spot 3x and still nothing just burned me I’m so upset that I was looking forward hoping it’s great and the hair will take long to come out don’t waist your $ honestly I never write a review but I did this cuz I know how much it means to us females especially now that summer is arriving .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can not tell how hot your wax is before use.
customer_reviews.text: The dial to determine how hot you want it is not visible to see. You are able to see if it is on but can not tell if it’s on low or high. The instructions say put it on 100 but the dial reads high or low.... that does not help. There is no instruction on the wax beads or how much to use at a time. I did try it out and it does remove the hair. It comes with a tea tree treatment spray to use before the wax and oil. That’s works pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Shea Desso

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit.No need to go get waxed Saving $$$.Does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Irmay Colon Aviles

customer_reviews.title: This Wax Warmer is a great product and comes with everything you need to get ...
customer_reviews.text: This Wax Warmer is a great product and comes with everything you need to get started right away. The whole package includes a wax warmer plus different kinds of wax. There are different temperature settings so you can adjust the temperature whatever you want. I love the wax beans because they are so easy to use and store. Overall I am satisfied with this product. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Cheng.Jr.

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: had to get the first one replaced as it stopped working... the replacement works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product has everything I was looking for. Reasonable price: Check. Easy to use: Check. Adjustable heat: Check. Easy to clean: Double check. There was even more than I expected! I have tried different professional type warmers before and trust me this is the best I have used (thinking of the price and the quality). When it reaches a certain temperature it stops heating, it works just like electric stoves. So I set the hottest temperature first and turn it down later, that works perfectly. The wax can is removable so you can clean it if you like. It has two bottles of oil (pre and post epilation) and I like both of them. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Nilay Dinc

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if I am the only one having this issue but I will turn it on high for 20 minutes and it seems in that time the light on the waxer turns off pretty quickly. Then once i try to apply the wax I feel like I have to keep it on high or the wax doesn’t stay hot enough. Once I try to apply it I get one stroke on my skin before it starts to dry up already and hardens. It took me quite a few times to actually get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great at home kit- even for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Great at home kit and came with so many wax beads! As soon as I received it, I used it! It did not disappoint! Easy to use, even as a beginner... plugged in, poured beads in, waited about 10 minutes and voila! Ready to use! That easy, especially for beginners! I had a concern about the warmer turning off and on while warming up.. I reached out to the company and received a response almost immediately... great customer service and great product for a fraction of what I was paying at the salon.
customer_reviews.author: kristy

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: Although this product does what it says, The wax that comes with it does not count the hairs very well and does not rip them out. However, it is very easy to use as it honestly does not matter what level you put the knob and it seems to only heat up a certain amount and then the light turns off but it stays hot so don’t be scared by that. Other than that it is very easy to use and very simple for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. You just dump your wax beads in and start using once melted. I like that it comes with everything you need to get started, including sticks. This wax also does not require clothe straps tobe removed and was gentle on my skin
customer_reviews.author: Quyen N.

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was literally the best purchase I’ve ever made. You’re looking at a girl that spends 40$ plus dollars on waxing every two weeks!! Now with this wax warmer I can wax myself! The warmer warms up fast and it came with so many beans to try!! I love it! I waxed my lip as soon as I got it and it worked great! I’m saving so much I love this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Georges Rohmer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wax warmer!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect wax warmer to use for anyone with sensitive skin. Halfway across works as the perfect temperature for me. I just leave it on for 10+ mins for all the wax beads to melt and it comes to perfect consistency. Be sure to be careful not to get even a drop on clothes or carpet. It's easier to clean tiles, wood, and other floors than fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Love C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and awesome service
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time using a wax warmer and it did not disappoint. I played with it a little until I found the best way for me to do it and then it was a breeze. It heats up super fast, melts awesom, and retains the heat very well. I would definitely recommend this product for anyone looking to change up the way they get rid of their body hair.
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEY MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Easy and funny tu use it.
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this product to my wife and she says that her pro wax 100 and it was amazing to make the depilation by myself, it was super easier to use, first I read all the instructions carefully, but I was a Little bit insecure how to do it and I looked for some tutorials on youtube and it was much easier. The only thing that I'd include in the instructions would be a brief resume how to clean and care our pro max 100, I saw some tutorials in youtube about how to clean it. In general, I recommend this product easy and funny to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Cruz

customer_reviews.title: First timer and was easy and effective!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived faster than I thought it would! It arrived on Mother's day and I was more than thrilled! This immediately made my purchase experience amazing. Instructions to use the product were clear, all items were included and within a couple of minutes, I was waxing my legs. This is the first time I wax or use any related products and I certainly would recommend it, it is a painful process, but the oils they provide give relief and soothe the area. Waxing is definitely worth it, the melt wax beans left my skin feeling super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Heats well but mine came with broken temp know
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but have only used once. it arrived with the temperature knob cracked and broke when it was first used. It came with the wax beads and wooden sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya3bbmom

customer_reviews.title: I have saved myself time and money with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have save myself time and money with this purchase. I set it on high to melt the pellets, and then I set it to medium prior to applying to my skin. I no longer need to schedule an appointment at the salon. I no longer need to worry about being charged for cancellations due to emergencies. I am saving money on gas, tips, and appointments. And I am reclaiming my time spent traveling and waiting for my appointment.
customer_reviews.author: D. SUMMERVILLE

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Pack your patience.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use if you follow the instructions. It can take a bit of practice and patience to gage the temp to the perfect setting without burning yourself. Plan to purchase more wax sticks (popsicle sticks) asap if you plan to use this often. The wax beads are ok but I plan to buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: jbyrd31

customer_reviews.title: Machine is fine, but the wax...
customer_reviews.text: The warmer works just fine, there's not AMAZING temperature control but overall it does its job. The wax however is where I had a huge issue. For one, it smells terrible, definitely like melting plastic. Secondly, it does not do the job well whatsoever. Everywhere I applied the wax, using every technique in the book, it left so much hair behind and didn't pull out any of the hair really it just broke it off at the surface and a couple hours later it feels like I only shaved instead of waxed. Honestly just buy a different wax with it.
customer_reviews.author: Keegan Paras

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Product came right on time. It was new and well put together. My first time using this so I had to learn how to use it myself but pretty easygoing. It is time consuming but that’s how waxing is. But it’s great overall. At least it’s not as sticky as wax strips which is crazy messy. This dries up and you just peel it off. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Sopha

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Second waxer I ordered. I tried a different brand and it was junk compared to this! Heats up the wax fast and even! Very quick shipping and really nice applicators. They aren't all grainy like others
customer_reviews.author: Anney

customer_reviews.title: Invest in a better product and thank me later
customer_reviews.text: This product as a whole(warmer and wax beads) is very low quality. The temperature control is wacky, the wax breaks off mid pull, etc. I highly advise you to invest in a better wax warmer and wax beads. Some good brands are: Mermaid Wax, Starpil Wax, and Cirpel
customer_reviews.author: Shenia Girvan

customer_reviews.title: If I could return it back...
customer_reviews.text: First of all came almost a week late and when it came the 2 little bottles was leaking so the box was really oily when I’ve opened. The wax takes like 20 minutes to melt and they said when it’s get “warm” turn down to medium thing that gets hard almost immediately. When you’re waxing it’s feeling like hard candy so you can imagine how cheap it is but to finish it won’t work on me I’ve got the pain and nothing came off.
customer_reviews.author: Ninoshka

customer_reviews.title: For beginners and professionals! Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this wax warmer and the results! I waxed my armpits and belly as soon as I got it and it does wonders! I had never waxed in my life and this made it super easy. People, don’t waste your money buying crazy expensive ones! This one is for a reasonable price and you get four packs of beans and two bottles of oil for skin prep and post wax. Worth Buying!
customer_reviews.author: Jaspe Martínez

customer_reviews.title: Heats up fast!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a beginner since everything is shut down due to COVID and I am so glad I did. As soon as I got it, I set it up. It quickly melted the wax and held it at a steady temperature. Easy to apply/remove and the sprays that come with it where a nice bonus and helped take away the sting. If you’re a beginner, I suggest watching YouTube videos on how to properly apply/rip the wax so it’s as little pain as possible!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Best Wax warmer kit
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality product. Its not even a week yet that I have started using it and i love it. Its a package for decent price including a pre wax spray and after wax spray also wax beans. This package also saves money for the wax stripes.
customer_reviews.author: Nav

customer_reviews.title: Heats fast
customer_reviews.text: Did not like, these are plastic balls not wax. Pot heats fast, but that it. Did not remove hair. Messy
customer_reviews.author: sonia francis

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: First i buy this still not so good how to use it but its better to have one at my place it comes with all those things you see in the picture i love it
customer_reviews.author: Ess E.

customer_reviews.title: Alright for the price
customer_reviews.text: The wax that comes with the kit is awful. Have to re apply many times to remove all hair in a small space. The heating pot is basically two temperatures: high and off. I have to turn it on high to melt the wax then turn it off and work with the melted wax until it cools to hard to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: New to the waxing game
customer_reviews.text: I have never done a wax myself ever.. my first time showed it too. Once I get down how to apply it smoothly without having hot wax strings spider webbing all around my face then we may be okay... stay tuned.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Warmer works great, the wax not so much!
customer_reviews.text: I am giving the warmer 3 stars, but the wax should get zero stars. Takes off hardly any hair. I will buy a different wax and hopefully will have better luck. The warmer heats it up great!
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but not easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Product is good for its price, I tried waxing for the first time. Easy to use and it has good temperature control. But while cleaning the kit it is bit messy not easy to clean had to use paper towels when it is warm to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: ShivaR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wax warmer
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a cheap wax warmer in the past and had a horrible experience with the temperature control on it. I decided to try this one out and it was such a difference. The temperature control is awesome. The pot is actually bigger than I expected and is super easy to clean. The inclusion of the beads is a plus. Waxed my entire legs and the warmer and beads did the job. I’m very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gochoa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still hurts a lot but work for taking all hair off
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Easy product, would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this since all the salons have been closed and this has been a great product to use in the meantime. I’ve never waxed myself but after spending some time doing it, it’s almost became second nature. Each packet gives you a good amount of wax to do your legs or armpit in one go. Very cute packaging and the wax is good quality. Would recommend as an alternative to going to the salon if you’re trying to save money or stay inside during the pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Perez

customer_reviews.title: Tempreture control is so good
customer_reviews.text: I love it, i did try other wax warmers before this one melts the was bean so fast, and tempreture control is so nice. They also send free wax beans after you buy the product but you have to follow some steps
customer_reviews.author: Mariam

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. I tried turning it on and after working for about 10 minutes it just wouldn’t stay on. I keep trying to put it in different outlets and jiggling the cord a little but it just won’t stay on and no it won’t even turn on. Update: the company reached out to me after I wrote this review and offered a new product to me. I opted for a refund instead but know that if your product does arrive broken their customer service is great.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Very little pain, takes a few tries to get the hang of it
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product, once you set the temperature how you want it, the wax stays the same: warm enough to use but not to hot where you cannot handle it. I was scared at first because I thought it would hurt where it would be hard to handle but I was preety surprised about the little pain there is. I took a bit to get the hang of where to leave the temperature and the right way to apply and pull but once I got it, it was preety easy. Afterwards, it left my skin feeling smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Viri sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners like myself who usually go to get waxed but are doing it on themselves for the first time. Application was a little tricky at first but I figured out what worked for me and how thick to apply. It’s easier to remove the hair before the wax cools completely. If it cools too much it gets hard and cracks. If you remove it when it cools but has that warm underside you get the most hair.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: This wax kit was really easy to use. Its great for beginners, you just add the beads and let it warm up. The pink beads were not as strong as the black ones, which was great for me since I do have some sensitive skin. I can use the stronger wax in areas that need it, but can still use the pink for parts of my face. It really does save me a lot more money since I don't have to pay $5 every two weeks to get my upper lip wax. It's a great investment!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Xitlaly Lucas

customer_reviews.title: This product is great.
customer_reviews.text: I have been reviewing various at-home waxing options and I finally decided to just get this and I am def. not disappointed. It's simple, you melt the wax, put it on, wait a few seconds and pull it off as quickly as you can and that's it. I am really happy with this purchase. The warmer comes with various bags of wax but I don't know what the differences between them are since they all say the same thing. I used the pink bag and I was very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Lior

customer_reviews.title: Works Great but the wax smells like rubber
customer_reviews.text: The wax and warmer work perfectly. The only reason I didn’t give 5 stars was because it said it was scented but unfortunately it is not. Smells like rubber not strawberry, lavender, blackberry or green tea. The smell isn’t horrible but I was expecting pleasant scents. Other than that, it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Thefink15

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wax warmer and wax!!!
customer_reviews.text: This wax warmer works great and really easy for beginners. The wax removed the hair on the first try and I did not have to use much. It was painless!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It works very well. The wax warmer heats up fast and maintains the wax temperature well. I used the lavender/purple wax beans, and it’s very good! It is easy to use, but you need to be careful because the wax gets very hot.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Fontana

customer_reviews.title: Great product, wish it had degrees instead of “high.”
customer_reviews.text: This wax machine was exactly what I was looking for! I bought it for personal use and have been figuring it out the last two weeks. It definitely takes some time to master waxing if you’re not a professional, but this wax machine is relatively easy to figure out. I wish the temperature dial had degrees Celsius or Fahrenheit on it instead of just “off” and “high.” Overall. It’s a great bargain and the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: It definitely works!
customer_reviews.text: My first time using a waxing anything. Lol. I did watch a few tutorials and read reviews to get myself educated. Let me just say this thing WORKS!! It will take the hair off! I absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. Mine works very well the wax ( when applied correctly) does a fabulous job. Great waxing pot for beginners or people with more experience. I was pleasantly surprised with the amount of wax that came in the box. Overall product was 5 stars for me. Very easy and straight forward to use.! Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylyn

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Works great, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This wax warmer is great! I used it as soon as it arrived & the wax was easy to apply & peel off. The warmer itself is very easy to use and works perfectly. I’m definitely recommending this to my sisters, & fellow waxers.
customer_reviews.author: WonderWhendy

customer_reviews.title: Cant wait to use!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Awesome unit. Glad I bought it! Looks cheap but works fast and well. Id buy it again! Haven't used it yet but received in good condition and beads smell good.
customer_reviews.author: MeGo

customer_reviews.title: It Gets The Job Done.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time waxing on my own and it went pretty well. Everything came in the kit like the description said.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: All including
customer_reviews.text: Comes with everything you need to start waxing! The only minor disadvantage is that it takes about 15 minutes for the wax to fully warm up.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Pham

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, came with instructions, lots of people on YouTube have made video reviews on this product to make it even easier to use. Love how the machine turns off and on in its own to help with temperature control. The wax actually works, other products the wax doesn’t take anything off.
customer_reviews.author: Annalie Franco

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money.
customer_reviews.text: I love this, I’ve been meaning to buy a wax warmer for a long time no finally did it and this product is easy to use and the wax was great, melts well and holds its temperature well.
customer_reviews.author: Alli Hartley- W

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wax warmer, and it is so easy to work with. I am new to waxing myself, but I found this so easy to use and I would recommend this product to any beginners!!
customer_reviews.author: A.A

customer_reviews.title: Best $20 I've spent!
customer_reviews.text: The warmer came exactly as pictured. It comes with 5 packs of hard wax beads. It can get a little messy but once you get the hang of it it's amazing! You can adjust the temperature to your preference. I melt wax on the highest setting and then turn it back down to the next to highest while waxing. If done right it lasts for weeks! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Vashaunda R Ragland

customer_reviews.title: Warmer fine. Wax is not painless.
customer_reviews.text: Great warmer for beginners. However my dial fell right off after two uses. Had to glue it back on. The wax it came with is trash. It DOES in fact hurt to pull this wax off. It is NOT painless. I have googled and YouTubed multiple different methods of how to properly apply and pull the wax but it doesn’t remove my hair. I’ll have to try a different wax. The warmer is fine though.
customer_reviews.author: kali

customer_reviews.title: The waxing beans are of not good quality
customer_reviews.text: When I acually started using it the waxing machine turned on but after 5 min it stopped working .Ughh really ???Really disappointed.The temperature setting knob is a little difficult to operate with ,Needs a lot of wax beans to wax even a small area.Overall I'm not impressed.Just keeping this product because I used a packet of beans completely will testint it for the first time
customer_reviews.author: jin

customer_reviews.title: First time user for body waxing
customer_reviews.text: My sister and I never tried waxing before so this is our first time using waxing kit. After the first try, we thought the wax beans smell like burning plastic or rubber instead of what it advertised as citrus. Otherwise, it was very easy to use wax warmer and the product does help you remove some facial or body hairs if you repetitively do on the same spot. It doesn't hurt as much which was a good thing. We wish there were more Popsicle sticks. The price was overall fair but we felt like it should be under $20.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: knob and heating issues
customer_reviews.text: so this does exactly what i need it to do but a lot of the time I have to play with temperature to get it right. it either heats it up to scalding or it is too low to get the right consistency. plus the knob fell off the day after i got it,thankfully it was an easy fix and it could be popped right back on.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for men and women!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and company! Such a spectacular deal! The wax is nice and it's great for home use! Thank you guys so much!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Heuler

customer_reviews.title: Works great, Compact Wax Warmer
customer_reviews.text: We order this wax warmer recently to check if it is easier & safe to do at home. After receiving the kit, it has a lot of wax beans to try on. The use of this wax warmer is very easy. Just melt the wax and apply it to the area you need waxing. This wax ripped out all the hair as promised and less painful. We are very happy with this wax warmer and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amith J

customer_reviews.title: Good Product just a little hard to understand
customer_reviews.text: The Product is pretty good quality and mostly easy to use. the only downside is that while mixing the wax , the pot kept going in circles with my hand which is pretty annoying and the temperature control is a little confusing only because i’m not sure what temperature to leave it on when i want to begin waxing myself. Every time i leave it on the temperature i think is perfect it either ends up being way too hot or not hot enough.
customer_reviews.author: gl0

customer_reviews.title: Best wax I’ve found
customer_reviews.text: This little pot does the job. But the wax beans that come with this are quite possibly the best wax I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Z

customer_reviews.title: Great wax warmer, Poor quality wax...
customer_reviews.text: The wax warmer works great and is good quality. My only compliants however is the wax is not of food quality at all and the sticks are rather bulky. Can't really be precise when doing eyebrows with such bulky sticks. But all in the warmer it's self is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Monroe

customer_reviews.title: So Simple!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few at home wax beads that I would have to microwave but the warmer is a game changer!. First of all, it keeps the wax at the right temp the whole time and no need to be running to the kitchen to microwave more wax mid process. The wax itself was also amazing. It only stuck to the hair and did not hurt as bad as other wax beads. Overall a very pleasant experience!!
customer_reviews.author: ariadne

customer_reviews.title: Works great & easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! The wax melts quickly and this particular vendor provides wax refills! Amazing. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Taina Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. I was done and waxed 30 minutes after I received it. It’s a way better investment than any store bought waxing kit and does a way better job. The only thing I suggest is if you’re using it on your eyebrows and you’re a beginner like me, try a smaller popsicle stick and cover the area you don’t want waxed to make sure you don’t drip any on all of your eyebrow.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This wax kit was great it does what it’s supposed to do but once you apply the wax on your skin it dries really fast causing it to barely spread on your skin, then when you want to remove the wax from your skin it breaks into pieces which cause it to be a bit painful
customer_reviews.author: Estefani

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading just a few good reviews...the box said it contained more items than it actually did. Also, the instructions were poorly put into English and kept mentioning water instead of wax. The beads did not have any information as far as what they contained, so I did not feel comfortable using them on myself. Ended up returning the product
customer_reviews.author: Sav

customer_reviews.title: Recommended heat wax, skin safe, for begginers and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product very much! Not a long waiting time 'till it gets warm/hot. Even if it says "Professional Use Only," it can also definitely be used by beginners who has experience with waxing and have done their research. The heat adjustment is easy to control as well and it doesn't burn my skin at all. I highly recommend it for everyone! (:
customer_reviews.author: nathaniel lopez

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The wax included with this is not good for anything except eyebrows. It’s not good for course upper lip or legs. Rather painful in the bikini area. The warmer works ok — I would just suggest a different wax.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Best wax kit out there!!! And, I’ve tried a ton!
customer_reviews.text: Best wax kit out there! Warmer is incredible- warms fast and then is the only kit that I find easy to cool down so that you don’t burn yourself. The wax is the best wax there is- it actually removes all the hair with less pain than others! You best bet I’m recommending this!! Buy it. You won’t regret it, I can promise you that!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Wax Warmer
customer_reviews.text: Awesome wax warmer! I ordered this warmer based on the reviews and price. I love that the warmer has different heat settings and stays consistent. The warmer melts the wax beads quickly and keeps it at an even heat while I apply the wax. I'm still learning when the best time to pull off the wax is but it definitely pulls most of my hair. I would definitely recommend this warmer!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen J. Kresge

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it, until my E Wax Center reopens.
customer_reviews.text: I have been getting waxes for over 15 years and needed help as I refused to shave. I could potentially rate this a 5, but have only used it on my underarms and chin. But so far so good. I’ll try my legs tomorrow. I didn’t use many beads at first because I wasn’t sure how much to put, but I got the knack of it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Diaz

product_meta.title: Wax Warmer, Portable Electric Hair Removal Kit for Facial &Bikini Area& Armpit- Melting Pot Hot Wax Heater Accessories Total Body Waxing Spa or Self-waxing Spa in Home for Girls & Women & Men
product_meta.description:
Packages:
1 *wax warmer
4 *3.5oz wax beans（blackberry, lavender, strawberry, greentea）
10pcs* wood-sticks

CE Approval
Voltage: AC 110 V, 60HZ, US Heavy Duty PLUG
Power: 100W
Capacity: 400cc
Weight 750g/1.65 lbs
Size: 20*20*15.2cm/7.9*7.9*6.1in

Directions For Use:
1. Clean the area you want to to be dealt with.
2. Take appropriate amount of wax beans into a depilatory wax heater.
3. Heat the wax to a melting temperature until it melted totally.(about 20 minutes) Spread the melted wax on the skin along the direction of the hair growth.(Always test the temperature of the wax before putting the melted wax on your skin )
4. Let the melt wax have a short period cooling and then holding the skin taut, remove wax with a firm action against the direction of the hair growth quickly and strongly.
5. Clean the skin with skin cream after hair removal waxing. 

Cleaning Instructions:
a.Cleaning the wax pot while it is still warm is much easier than when it completely cooled down.
b.Turn the electric wax warmer off, unplug it and let the wax stay until the wax pot is not hot and safe to touch. Put a few drops of fragrance and color free oil onto a paper towel and wipe out the pot/ machine as well as the rim.The oil will dissolve the wax and it simply disappears. Any oily residue left behind can be wiped off with a clean, dry cloth. Using oil will also prolong the life of your wax pot or machine.

Note: 
The colors of our hair removal wax accessorize may different in photo and real life due to variations between the computer monitors and naked eye color difference. 

Warranty:
100% Brand New and High quality from Kids Partner. Kids Partner offers 6 months limited Warranty and 30 days free exchange for all the Kids Partner products which are built with the reliable quality standards and we stand behind for best after service.
feature_bullets: Nursing Your Body Skin: Wax hair remover machine is using for hair removal nursing, beauty care and skin care.

Safety Combination: The wax kit for hair removal is safe to use with the wooden chips without burning your skin while using the melted wax. The see-through cover gernerates the heat on the wax, accelerating the wax melting and preventing the wax contamination by dust.

Multipurpose: Fits any type of wax including wax beads, hard wax, soft wax, 14 ounce wax cans, loose wax, bricks bikini wax, microwavable wax and hair wax. This heating wax warmer is popular among any professional esthetician. A DIY beauty lover also can waxing at home. Widely used in salons and spas. Also can be used by women and men.
Durable and Light: With high quality and high temperature materials, electric cable and plug, This wax kit for hair removal is very durable and light. it is irreplaceable for any waxing needs.
Easy Operation: You just need a wax heater pot,and a wooden chip-sticks to apply the wax to the area you want to deal with.
